page.title: 09FUN AT ABINGDON FAIR
page.content: Its fun at the fair. The twister is my best, they say if you scream a lot you stay on longer. I have only been on the Big Wheel once because when the cage is at the top of the wheel my dad swings it round. I like going on the Tunnel of Love, first it goes slow, then fast and the lights flash, then it slows down, then it stops still. Then sometimes it starts going backwards then it goes faster and faster. I always have candy floss or a hot dog. They are 40p each. I like going on the ghost train and it is very scary and I get frightened. I also go on the dodgem cars, Little Wheel, Octopus and the Fun House. I try to win a gold fish or a coconut on some of the other stalls. Written by Lisa Edwards aged l0 years.
